Articles.Content: so, Ill be building a rocket and Ill put on some radial decouplers, and then Ill try to attatch rocket tanks to the decouplers, but the tank wont turn green. it stays red and wont attach. Ill have to deselect the tank, reselect the tank and try again. has anyone else had trouble with this?
Yeah, it's just a bug in the current version. I'll be fixed.
Just place them somewhere the game allows you and then try again on the spot you wish to attach them. That works most of the time...

I have had luck by changing the viewing angle while attaching radially coupled rockets. I have also connected one rocket on a single radial coupler, then disconnected at the coupler and then do my symmetric and reattach. Sometimes fixes that "impossible to connect" frustration.

Alpha games mean only one thing...continuous improvement. First one I have ever been involved in. Wonderful concept.

Connect the tank to the bottom of your stack for a second, then pick it up and put it on the decoupler.

Make sure your mouse pointer is over the decoupler, the tank should connect to it.
